name: Robot vs Birds Zombies
description: Robot vs. Birds Zumbies depicts the spread of avian influenza virus through the infected dead birds that turned into zombies, a robot is built by survivors to eliminate that threat, your mission is to control the robot to remove the birds and prevent zombies proliferation of the virus.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 Processor: Core 2 duo 3ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Like skyrim but with angry birds.
Got a 66% coupon, so I bought it to see if it was really that bad. It was worse than that.

A not very good angry birds clone. The description of the game talks about getting machines to work, but there is nothing of the sort.  There are far better versions of this game available for free and playable in your browser.  Aside from not being a very good clone of Angry Birds there are major issues such as the screen not keeping up with the rocks you fire, so you can't even see where they are landing properly.  A total waste of money and time.

This sucks.  Unplayable when the rocket decides to destroy itself instead of following the path.  Bad interface.  Load up the game.  Panning picture of birds and robots.  Must be the loading screen.  Wait... It's not. This is the main menu.  Where are the buttons?  Figure it out, because it's too hard to add in letters into the game or a real menu.  This game shouldn't be $0.99. It should be 10 cents, or free. Even the free games aren't as bad as this game.
Well I guess you couldn't ask for much when the game was $0.25...
Honestly I don't know what I expected
